description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Top Hairstylist" mini-game!
Welcome! How much are we cutting today?
Being a top stylist means accurately fulfilling the customer's wishes.
We don't need any rigid rulers here. I remember everything by feeling.
What length are you ordering? Alright, got it!
name: Additional mini-game "Top Hairstylist"
